title: A nonsolvolytic fluorine/LiNO3-containing electrolyte for stabilizing dynamic interfaces in Li||LiMn2O4 batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14964-14972
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08016A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tian Tang, Nyalaliska W. Utomo, J. X. Kent Zheng, Lynden A. Archer
Complementary characterization results show that chemical dissolution of transition metal in LiMn2O4 is caused by solvolysis-generated HF, which can be suppresed by rational design of a group of nonsolvolytic electrolytes.
